thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: For Global Markets, an Uncertain Anniversary

author: Akane Otani
title: For Global Markets, an Uncertain Anniversary
text:
U.S. stocks have rebounded since their tumble on Feb. 11, 2016, when sliding oil prices and bank stocks stoked fears of a slowdown in global growth and drove major indexes to multiyear lows.
Oil prices, which hit a 13-year low on Feb. 11, have more than doubled since the selloff, thanks to an improving global economic picture. Meanwhile, gold, which investors tend to buy in times of uncertainty, has ticked higher.
Bond...
